author: Andrew Cornhill
comment: Bought the tags and was promised an extra year of premium due to a special price being offered 48 hours later but unfortunately after a years use it reverted to free.  I also bought the golf pad link which works well but there still seems to be a difference in the distance to hole displayed by the app compared to other gps devices

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content:
Andrew, please email support@golfpadgps.com and we'll set up the extra year of premium. We'll also need a few more details about the gps distances so we can better understand and fix the issue.

Thank you,
Golf Pad team.

author: David Adolf
comment: Just started with this and still figuring it out, but so far it's pretty easy to use, gives me good yardages, and serves as a score card. That's all I ask.

author: drew english
comment: Best app I have used for score keeping. works with most smart watches. Could use more social features to use with friends.

author: Declan Sherlock
comment: Absolutely brilliant and when you get to know the app and what it can do, it improves your game by letting you know exactly how far you hit each club, so the right club can be selected

author: Bilal Suliman
comment: works perfect on the phone but can't seem to link it with my Samsung gear 3 frontier watch.

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content:
Bilal, sorry about the issue - please email support@golfpadgps.com and we will assist.

Thank you,
Golf Pad team.

author: JCLaraakaSpeedy
comment: I have only used this for 2 rounds and so far very excited

author: Vince Garcia
comment: Yay!

author: Dave Jordan
comment: Best out there

author: Shahzad Arif
comment: Nice app.

author: William Smith
comment: Good app

author: Scott Fohey
comment: Many of the features in the "free highlights" description that are listed as "It's free and will be free forever" are now only available in the Premium version. Complete false advertising!

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content:
Scott, thank you for brining this to our attention. I just went through the list and I believe all features listed in 'free highlights' are indeed available in the free version and don't require premium upgrade. If I missed anything, please reply here or email support@golfpadgps.com so we can take a closer look.

Thank you,
Golf Pad team.

author: Peter Smith
comment: The best most flexible, accurate GPS that I have found. I've tried many but none compare. Others have lacked features, or been too cumbersome to use for a round. Golfpad incorporates the best features of any and does it well. The free app is adequate but I like the full features of the subscription. Worth every cent.

author: Joshua Bradley
comment: The golf tags where horrible. Came apart and fell if the clubs. The app itself is awesome

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content:
Joshua, glad you like the app! Sorry about the issue with the tags - please email support@golfpadgps.com and we will provide replacements at no charge. 

Golf Pad team.

author: Gordon Hayase
comment: Best golf app out there. Customer service is very quick to respond and solve issues. Free version is great, and the enhanced features of the paid upgrade are definitely worth the price.

author: Johnny Shu
comment: Other golf tracking apps don't compare. With golf pad link and smartwatch, never have to look at my phone. Can make course corrections in app which is amazing
Very well designed app; I believe covers all aspects for what any golfer would find handy!

author: Barry Turner
comment: Simple easy to use app for keeping score and giving distance to pin or hazard.

author: Jody johnson
comment: Thanks for the app. Very reliable and easy to use.

author: Cledus Bynum
comment: Great golf app and very easy to use.

author: Jim Henderson
comment: Great golf app. Get the link

author: Rocky Topps Tree Service
comment: Awesome

author: Niel Van Renen
comment: In pro version - Any chance of bringing in more detailed stats for chipping? To see how well you chip with the different clubs in your bag. Would love to compare my lw vs sw or my 8i bump&runs for example

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content: Niel, glad to hear you like the app! Yes, major stats updates are planned for later this year and will include much more detailed chipping analysis.

author: Dan Partington
comment: This app is a perfect replacement for a paper score card, I tested 4 different apps while playing 18 holes and this one was the clear winner for user experience

author: Pratik Jain
comment: How do we check the distance and Mark our second shot on the fairway.?

author: Darren Moore
comment: Scratching my head!

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content: Hello Darren. How can we help? Please reply here or email support@golfpadgps.com.

comment: Brilliant app, would recommend.

author: Steven Cope
comment: Easy interface.  A good on-course tool.

author: John Wherry
comment: Have not even used this on course yet, but ability to edit incorrect course data is AWESOME! Had correct satellite images but old course layout. Took a little time, but I fixed it myself, no waiting months on end for an update!

author: Jeff Andrews
comment: Great shot tracker! Android Wear, Samantha Gear watch support! Great range finder! And best of all the support staff is extremely helpful!

author: MAIKETSO KGANTSI
comment: By far THE BEST GOLF GPS APP...THE BEST...SUPER ACURATE AND VERY EASY TO USE...I LOVE IT.

author: Percy Lau
comment: Loved it enough to buy the pro version

author: Brad Sun
comment: Very easy to compare previous play. Distance to pin has been spot on.

author: Jaco Jooste
comment: Nice tot keep score

author: Annie Lee
comment: It's pretty handy~

author: Larry Brown
comment: Great golf app.  Much better yardage accuracy than the others I tried.  I use it to keep score.... Track my poor putting.... And as a backup for yardages to my laser rangefinder.... Especially for things like # of yards to carry a bunker etc.

author: Brett McKinney
comment: I'm not sure if the issue with the status bar (stays base was being active in my pocket and screwing up all kinds of stuff) has been fixed in the latest release, or not.  Regardless, pinning the screen addresses it for now anyways. Support is always solid with this app, and it's been an inseparable part of my game for years now.

reply.author: Golf Pad GPS
reply.content:
Brett, thank you for reporting the problem. We confirmed and fixed the issue with putting from a smartwatch. The fix will be included in the next version of the app.

Thank you,
Golf Pad team.

author: Kittipong Paul Phaerukkakit
comment: Love it, easy to use. Would have given 5 star, just for the sand does not have stroke input.

author: Mark Bower
comment: Great app especially when used with my pebble watch...

author: Steve Ingledow
comment: Great app simple to use
Great app and easy to use
